body:
objects/string.cc: uint16_t SlicedString::Get(...) implementation
objects/string.h: SlicedString class with parent/offset and kMinLength
objects/string-inl.h and objects/string.cc handle GetUnderlying and Flatten routing for sliced strings
explanation: Anchors for SlicedString behavior: parent/offset fields, Get implementation, interplay with Flatten and GetUnderlying.
